alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 5:04AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Areas of blowing snow Sunday night and Monday. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...East Sweetwater County. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 PM Monday. The heaviest snow is expected Sunday night and Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Winter travel conditions are likely, with slick roads and periods of low visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
